title: Chicago Med Is Having Its Best Season Yet — Except for One Thing
description: Chicago Med has been having one of its strongest seasons yet, but there's only one thing that has been bringing it down. We discuss it here! The post Chicago Med Is Having Its Best Season Yet — Except for One Thing appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Jasmine Blu

title: Should 9-1-1’s Next Disaster Be More Grounded in Reality?
description: 9-1-1 loves a big emergency, but is it time to scale back on the epic disasters and find emergencies more grounded in reality? We discuss! The post Should 9-1-1’s Next Disaster Be More Grounded in Reality? appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Whitney Evans

title: Mayfair Witches Renewed for Season 3; EP Teases ‘Delicious’ Story Set in Salem
description: AMC is conjuring up more of Anne Rice’s Mayfair Witches, renewing the Immortal Universe drama for Season 3, TVLine has learned. Additionally, Thomas Schnauz (Breaking Bad) is joining Esta Spalding as co-showrunner. “I am thrilled to welcome Tom Schnauz to our team for the third season of Mayfair Witches,” Spalding says in a statement. “A […]
author: Andy Swift
